definitions.definition: One of the small pedestals , for statues or other ornaments , placed on the apex and at the basal angles of a pediment , or upon the gables in Gothic architecture .
One of the pedestals , for vases or statues, forming a part roof balustrade .

main_definition: ( architecture ) One of the small pedestals , for statues or other ornaments , placed on the apex and at the basal angles of a pediment , or upon the gables in Gothic architecture .
secondary_definitions: One of the pedestals , for vases or statues, forming a part roof balustrade .
